item.title: By: Dustglove
item.dc:creator: Dustglove
item.description:
<strong>WoW</strong>
Why are the servers down? Is Blizzard unable to get the raw power to keep them running or have parallel backups? Sony knows how the game works, and even since the original Everquest, all of their MMO launches have launched...
item.content:encoded:
WoW

Why are the servers down? Is Blizzard unable to get the raw power to keep them running or have parallel backups? Sony knows how the game works, and even since the original Everquest, all of their MMO launches have launched…
